title: Vase, ca. 1900
markings: Marks: On bottom in underglaze blue: "P:V:M"
provenance: James Cogar, Williamsburg, Va.; about 1957 WPW
description: Tall, twisted, fluted 8-sided vase with short flared foot and flaring mouthwith shaped rim; painted in underglaze blue on white with 8 vertical panelseach with flower bottom, alternate mid-sections of landscapes or flowers, top sections of flowers.

tombstone.epitaph:
Vase, ca. 1900.
ca. 1900. earthenware, tin glaze. Bequest of Walter Phelps Warren. 1986-61-31.
